trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Downingtown
There were 2 other sightings in Downingtown on or around May 15th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw what looked to be 5 or 6 lights in the sky just around dusk on the evening of tue. may 15th in Chester County PA. I've never seen anything like that before in the area or any where else. It was hard too get a good look with the trees. they looked to be low and some what large. as i moved to an area to get a better look they looked smaller and moved behind clouds. I did get a short video but I only saw 2 lights at the point and the video was onle able to get 1.
Summary: saw odd lights in pattern in the sky
